item.description:

{

{
startAnimation(1979);

}

castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();

castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Your life has been drained!”);

teleportToX = absX;

}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91)
{

}
}

{

}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 87)

break;
